verbs.description: super micro computer tumbles most in its short history super micro computer inc [ARGM-ADV: commonly] [V: known] [ARG2: as supermicro] plunged in thursday trading after bloomberg businessweek reported that a chinese hack infiltrated the u s technology supply chain by implanting tiny chips on motherboards supplied by the company shares of other leading server and network - storage firms also fell apple inc and amazon com inc were among companies that found malicious microchips on supermicro motherboards those companies as well as supermicro and china ministry of for bloomberg
